name: Star-wars-the-force-traitors
body:
### Welcome to Star Wars: The Force Traitors
Storm troopers are traitors, Darth Vader must kill them all and restore authority of the Dark Side

### Construct 2 Game Development Engine
Construct 2 is the most powerful Game Development Engine JavaScript based, you can export your game to the Web, Android, iOS, Windows and Blackberry.

### Sprite Sheet Extractor
This was so useful for extracting the Sprite Sheet
* https://github.com/ForkandBeard/Alferd-Spritesheet-Unpacker/releases

### Game Sprites
Sprites are not original, downloaded from Web with some Photoshop Editing.

### Game Sounds
Sounds credits go to:
* http://www.littlerobotsoundfactory.com/
* http://www.bfxr.net/
* https://soundcloud.com/paulo-bohrer-ii/star-wars-chiptune-medley
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
